comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Watch out here when you downloading the Wallet !I would not download and install this wallet or the Github FilesVirustotal : https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/b4c97114859a91401b6ff3c2e033b5b7a6bf66667930eecc4d86c022f786f6e7/detectionThere are 2 detections for Malware : UDS:Backdoor.Win32.RemcosQuoteMost of the instances, UDS:Backdoor.Win32.Remcos virus will certainly advise its targets to launch funds move for the purpose of neutralizing the amendments that the Trojan infection has actually introduced to the sufferer’s device.Source: https://howtofix.guide/udsbackdoor-win32-remcos/

comments.author: aulonius
comments.body: Quote from: Algoram on July 31, 2023, 11:33:29 AMQuote from: Lafu on July 31, 2023, 11:10:01 AMWatch out here when you downloading the Wallet !I would not download and install this wallet or the Github FilesVirustotal : https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/b4c97114859a91401b6ff3c2e033b5b7a6bf66667930eecc4d86c022f786f6e7/detectionThere are 2 detections for Malware : UDS:Backdoor.Win32.RemcosQuoteMost of the instances, UDS:Backdoor.Win32.Remcos virus will certainly advise its targets to launch funds move for the purpose of neutralizing the amendments that the Trojan infection has actually introduced to the sufferer’s device.Source: https://howtofix.guide/udsbackdoor-win32-remcos/Hi, yeah that problem now, we work for solve this.We use third party component for build exchange, mining pool and explorer in wallet.For one more day project will be solve for this problem.Thanks for notice!When you announce/release a new coin, then the first thing that you should do is to provide the source code (together with clear instructions to build the binaries). Everything else (binaries, website, explorer, discord, etc.) comes after. Being open-source is one of the important concepts of cryptocurrencies.Your binary contains Remcos, which is a serious malware. Even if the malware comes from your third party components (and not from you), you should not release the binaries. If this project is legit (and not a scam), then your first priority now should be to take down all download links to the binaries, remove the malicious third party components, and then provide the source code and new binaries.If you don't do this, then this project is an obvious scam and nobody should download the wallet.

comments.author: Algoram

comments.author: Algoram
comments.body: About our goalIn more detail - the main goal of the project is to help start-up projects that aim to achieve anonymity and privacy. Main goal of the project is to help start-up projects that aim to achieve anonymity and privacy. At the end of each month, for 12 months, we will fund these projects from our budget.The funding comes from transfer fees on our blockchain.The choice of the project to be funded will be left to our community.The more projects we fund, the more publicity our project will get.The more publicity we get, the higher the funding for other projects.Increased funding is offered through increased number of transfers - thus a higher number of commissions.It is important to realize that the funding will cover only part of the objectives of these projects. But even so, together we can strengthen the nodes of projects that use privacy and untraceable payments as their basis.At the moment we are busy fixing the wallet. The project will be updated soon
